attributes.action: Provide free sanitary products to anyone who bleeds.
attributes.additional_details: Free condoms are provided although sex is a choice. People who experience bleeding do not choose to bleed yet still have to pay extortionate prices to prevent the embarrassment of leaking or to feel more comfortable. These products are very pricy and many people are unable to afford these. Therefore sanitary products should be provided for free to those in need. This issue affects people of all genders, everywhere!
attributes.background: Free sanitary products should be available for those who experience bleeding. These could be environmentally friendly or single use.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: 

Make sanitary products freely available to all women
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/584711
